text: The Men's 100 metre breaststroke competition of the 2019 African Games was held on 22 August 2019. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text- align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !!
